ack.p: We thank Janet Fergen, Chloe Kruse, Mallory Johnson, Ryan Schmid, and Mike Bredeson for their technical assistance. James Hagler and James Harwood advised on method optimization. Randy Anderson, Adam Davis, and Frank Forcella reviewed earlier drafts of this manuscript. Petr Werner and Beth Choate identified ants. Analytic Rarefaction 1.3 is available at http://strata.uga.edu/software/. Mention of trade names or commercial products in this publication is solely for the purpose of providing specific information and does not imply recommendation or endorsement by the U.S. Department of Agriculture. The work of P. S. and A. H. was funded by the Czech Science Foundation (#526/09/1436).
